item.title: GL Paint
item.description: Paint is bloated The MS Paint application is bloated and so I needed something better, something simpler, something less “bloated” and so I set out on a quest to make my own “unbloated” paint application from scratch. Just kidding it was a college project that I completed with my team. Basically it is a paint application written in c++ and uses OpenGL. Features You can draw ( I thought this is pretty important ).
